teaser: What happens when you can’t ‘send in the clowns’ – because there just aren’t any left? Vanity Fair columnist Richard Lawson explains that a clown shortage might be on the horizon. The current clown workforce is aging and young people today just aren’t running off to join the circus like they used to.
